User-agent: *
# Allow site crawling by default
Allow: /

# Disallow lowâ€‘value or private paths
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /thank-you
Disallow: /success
Disallow: /search

# Disallow common tracking parameters (canonicalize to clean URLs)
Disallow: /*?*utm_*
Disallow: /*?*ref=*
Disallow: /*?*source=*

Sitemap: https://bradfordinformedguidance.com/sitemap_index.xml
